A story published Saturday said Mitch Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. It also noted that the candidate favored by party elites has almost always failed to win the nomination. As for Mike Pence , a story Friday highlighted the effort by a group of conservatives

Zahi Hawass , the director of the museum, said: Demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged. Only their heads were intact. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, and Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud,'' says Steve Ballmer , Microsoft's CEO. The things that make Microsoft Dynamics CRM an industry leader include giving sales professionals a familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data so they can improve their customers' experiences and effectively compete in the market More than 11,500 customers and 2,000 partners worldwide have used Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 as part of the beta programme, including customers that have switched from competing solutions.
